description_short: `upavAsam` with only water and next day `pAraNa` gives `Arogyam`
shlokas:
ASADha zuklaSaSThI tu tithiH kaumArilA smRtA.
kumAramarcayEttatra pUrvatrOpESya vai dinam..

description_short: Skanda darshanam is recommended, removes sins including brahmahatya.
shlokas:
yO'syAM pazyati gAGgEyaM dakSiNApathavAsinam .
brahmahatyAdi pApaistu mucyatE nAtra saMzayaH ..

description_short: Also known as `campA/campaka SaSThI`
shlokas:
sEnAvidAraka skanda mahAsEna mahAbala.
rudrOmAgnija SaDvaktra gaGgAgarbha namO'stu tE..

description_short: `saptamI tithi` on a Sunday is as sacred as a solar eclipse. Particularly good for worshipping Surya.
shlokas:
amAvasyA tu sOmEna saptamI bhAnunA saha.
caturthI bhUmiputrENa sOmaputrENa cASTamI.
 catasrastithayastvEtAH sUryagrahaNasannibhAH..

description_short: `saptamI tithi` on a Sunday is as sacred as a solar eclipse. Particularly good for worshipping Surya. Today is even more auspicious, as it is associated with `revatI` star.
shlokas:
amAvasyA tu sOmEna saptamI bhAnunA saha.
caturthI bhUmiputrENa sOmaputrENa cASTamI.
 catasrastithayastvEtAH sUryagrahaNasannibhAH..

description_short: `aSTamI tithi` on a Wednesday is as sacred as a solar eclipse.
shlokas:
amAvasyA tu sOmEna saptamI bhAnunA saha.
caturthI bhUmiputrENa sOmaputrENa cASTamI.
 catasrastithayastvEtAH sUryagrahaNasannibhAH..

description_short: `caturthI tithi` on a Tuesday is as sacred as a solar eclipse. Good day for doing puja of Ganesha/Subrahmanya with naivedyam of modakam/millet flour respectively.
shlokas:
amAvasyA tu sOmEna saptamI bhAnunA saha.
caturthI bhUmiputrENa sOmaputrENa cASTamI.
 catasrastithayastvEtAH sUryagrahaNasannibhAH..

description_short: `kRSNa caturdazI tithi` on a Tuesday is very sacred. Perform `tarpaNa` to Yama Dharamaraja.
`amAvasyA` on a Monday is as sacred as a solar eclipse. Particularly good for performing pradakshinam of Pippala tree.
shlokas:
amAvasyA tu sOmEna saptamI bhAnunA saha.
caturthI bhUmiputrENa sOmaputrENa cASTamI.
 catasrastithayastvEtAH sUryagrahaNasannibhAH.. mUlatO brahmarUpAya madhyatO viSNurUpiNE.
agrataH zivarUpAya vRkSarAjAya tE namaH..
akSispandaM bhujaspandaM duHsvapnaM durvicintanam .
 zatrUnAm ca samutpannam azvattha zamayasva mE ..

description_short: Have darshan of Moon today, chanting the following shloka
shlokas:
zvEtAmbaraH zvEtavibhUSaNazca zvEtadyutirdaNDadharO dvibAhuH.
candrO'mRtAtmA varadaH kirITI mayi prasAdaM vidadhAtu dEvaH..

description_short: Satya Harishchandra performed this to get back family and kingdom.
Indrasena's son did Ekadashi and as a result he was shifted from hell to heaven.
Celebrated especially in Kerala/Guruvayur.
Lord Vishnu goes to sleep.
shlokas:
vAsudEva jagadyOnE prAptEyaM dvAdazI tava.
bhujaGgazayanE'bdhau ca sukhaM svapihi mAdhava..
iyaM tu dvAdazI dEva zayanArthaM vinirmita .
asyAM suptE jagannAthE jagatsuptaM bhavEdidam ..
vibuddhE tvayi buddhyEta sarvamEtaccarAcaram ..

description_short: Side ways turn inside sleep of Vishnu midway after Shayana Ekadashi.
shlokas:
vAsudEva jagannAtha prAptEyaM dvAdazI tava.
 pArzvEna parivartasva sukhaM svapihi mAdhava..

description_short: Special vrata day for Ganesha. Fast during the day and pray to Ganesha after moonrise, as follows:
shlokas:
gaNAdhipastvaM dEvEza caturthyAM pUjitO mayA.
kaSTAn mAM mOcayEzAna sarvamiSTaM ca dEhi mE..

description_short: `saptamI tithi` on a Sunday is as sacred as a solar eclipse. Particularly good for worshipping Surya. When `zukla saptamI` is present at sunrise, it is called `vijayA`.
shlokas:
amAvasyA tu sOmEna saptamI bhAnunA saha.
caturthI bhUmiputrENa sOmaputrENa cASTamI.
 catasrastithayastvEtAH sUryagrahaNasannibhAH..

description_short: `saptamI tithi` on a Sunday is as sacred as a solar eclipse. Particularly good for worshipping Surya. When `zukla saptamI` is present at sunrise, it is called `vijayA`.
shlokas:
amAvasyA tu sOmEna saptamI bhAnunA saha.
caturthI bhUmiputrENa sOmaputrENa cASTamI.
 catasrastithayastvEtAH sUryagrahaNasannibhAH..

description_short: When Ashwini nakshatram falls on a Tuesday, it is a special `puNyakAlaH`. Do `upAsanA` of Lakshmi Narasimha.
When Anuradha nakshatram falls on a Wednesday, it is a special `puNyakAlaH` for performing danams. One can do dAnaM of dadhyodanam in Vishnu temples on this day.
Do puja to Surya/Suryanamaskaram.
Do puja to Surya/Suryanamaskaram.
Do `upavAsam` (at least do not take salt) and pray to Lord Shiva (Vaidyanatha Swami).
Perform special puja and naivedyam (e.g. `tilAnnam`) to Lord Venkateshwara.
When a lunar eclipse occurs on a Monday, it is even more special: `cUDAmaNi`, i.e. crest jewel.
When a solar eclipse occurs on a Sunday, it is even more special: `cUDAmaNi`, i.e. crest jewel.
A rare combination of `AyuSmAn yOga, bava karaNa` and `saumyavAsara`. Also a source of the normal blessing 'AyuSmAn bava saumya'!
Dvadashi tithi, combined with Punarvasu nakshatram.
Dvadashi tithi, combined with Pushya nakshatram.
Saptami tithi, combined with a sankranti.
A rare combination of Pausha masam, Shravana nakshatram, Vyatipata yogam and Monday.
A rare combination of Pausha masam, Shravana nakshatram, Vyatipata yogam and Sunday.
Dvadashi tithi, combined with Rohini nakshatram.
Phalguna Krishna Chaturdashi, combined with Shatabhishak Nakshatram.
Phalguna Krishna Chaturdashi, combined with Shatabhishak Nakshatram and Saturday.
Phalguna Krishna Chaturdashi, combined with Shatabhishak Nakshatram, Saturday and Shubha Yogam.
Dvadashi tithi, combined with Shravana nakshatram.
Tamil New Year.
